lines.text:
[to Giasone/Jason]
We're both like trees which produce a marvelous fruit that no one is allowed to gather.

[to Creusa]
Whenever your eyes are flashing with rage, you're even more beautiful.

[speaking of Creusa]
What good are the gems in the treasury of Thessaly when it is she I desire most of all? Her loveliness is ablaze in me like an open furnace.
